name:
Reclaimed
Purveyor
desc:
The Volantian Salvage Bureau's open, unregulated, no-questions-asked 'free market' for the independent, grey-area starfarers such as yourself.

Sells the salvaged hulls of the player's faction and it's enemies. Will also sell Volantian and Remnant hulls.

Selling blueprints here will cause the VRI to learn them.
